content.description: ELECTED REPRESENTATIVES FOR THE TOWN OF PURCELLVILLE, VIRGINIA
content.question: Legislative Body District Term Number of Elected Seats District Population Virginia House of Delegates 33 2 years 1 80,550 Virginia Senate 13 4 years 1 202,920 United States House of Representatives 10 2 years 1 750,886 United States Senate At large 6 years 2 8,470,020 President of the United States Nationwide 4 years 1 328,392,000 Which of the following identifies the scale of governance that would be most affected by an individual local voter in Purcellville?

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify the scales of analysis presented by maps, quantitative and geospatial data, images, and landscapes.
